Sentencas: A 3-cell stack of anode supported planar solid oxide fuel cell was built to evaluate the application of an external-manifold design in this research.
Titulo: Feasibility study of an external manifold for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells stack

Sentencas: This short stack was operated with hydrogen as fuel and air as oxidant at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Feasibility study of an external manifold for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells stack

Sentencas: The stack had an OCV of 3.36 V, produced about 100 W in total power with a power density of 0.56 W/cm(2).
Titulo: Feasibility study of an external manifold for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells stack

Sentencas: The stack also underwent 51 h degradation test at the current density of 0.55 A/cm(2).
Titulo: Feasibility study of an external manifold for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells stack

Sentencas: The test results have demonstrated that this external-manifold stack had an excellent and steady performance during the test.
Titulo: Feasibility study of an external manifold for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells stack

Sentencas: Computer simulation was employed to help optimizing the parameters of the design and explaining the different performances between the cells.
Titulo: Feasibility study of an external manifold for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells stack

Sentencas: The simulation results suggested that the external-manifold design could generate a uniform gas distribution for a short stack, and the different performances of the individual cells were mainly caused by the uneven temperatures distribution between the cells.
Titulo: Feasibility study of an external manifold for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells stack
